author: chris-dollin
msg: DoesNotReifyException - exception raised when trying to get a Statement
from a Resource that doesn't have the reification quads.
ReifiedStatement - the type of reifiedStatement resources, from which
RSIterator - an iterator that delivers ReifiedStatement objects.

author: chris-dollin
msg: A test case for Statements, added because:
this case came up when Chris was sorting out ReifedStatement and
had mishacked Model.createStatement. A resource created in one
model and incorporated into a statement asserted constructed by a
different model should test equal to the resource extracted from that
statement, even if it's a bnode.

author: chris-dollin
msg: ClosableWrapper allows any iterator to be wrapped as an ExtendedIterator,
allowing it to be closed, mappped, filtered, and passed around to places

author: chris-dollin
msg: GetTriple  expresses the idea of a type from which triples associated
